entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... The Vermont Agency of Natural Resources has issued a Air Quality Action Day for Fine Particulates for southern Vermont until midnight EDT tonight. Smoke from the Ohio valley region, originally from wildfires in far northwestern Canada, will continue to impact Vermont through Tuesday.

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued July 18 at 10:03AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... The West Virginia Department of Environmental Protection has issued a statewide air quality advisory for fine particulate matter until midnight tonight. Air Quality Index scores for most of the state are in the 151 to 150 range, which which can cause health effects in sensitive groups.
